items.name: theme
items.author: Actabl Design
items.title: Bellhop, indigo based theme
items.description: Bellhop is a theme for shadcn/ui that implements the indigo color scheme.
items.docs: Don't forget to download fonts and import it in your project.

items.author: Actabl Design
items.description: A customizable badge component with support for variants, sizes, icons, dots, avatars, and close buttons.

items.title: Toaster
items.author: Actabl Design
items.description: A customizable toaster component for displaying notifications with various styles and icons.

items.title: Featured Icon
items.author: Actabl Design
items.description: A reusable icon component with customizable color and aura effect.

items.description: A container component for the Bellhop application, including a header, side menu, and a data table.

items.author: Actabl Design
